languageKey.label: This section is used to specify the extension configuration.

This wizard can be used to automatically ugrade the version of your extension. If you set z, one unit will be added to the z part. It you set y, one unit will be added to the y part, while the z part is reset to 0. If you set x, one unit, will be added to the x part, while the y and z parts will be reset.
Set to display error messages on queries, if any. The Debug Query option should not be left in the final version of your extension for security reasons.
